name: Ronald Dump
strategyDescription: Randomly cooperates or betrays, with a heavier bias towards betrayal.

name: Vladislav Petrov
strategyDescription: Betrays 70% of the time, but occasionally cooperates to avoid predictability.

name: Jiáng Wei
strategyDescription: Cooperates early but switches to betrayal after 60% of turns.

name: Margaret Halloway
strategyDescription: Cooperates unless betrayed twice in a row.

name: Jean-Baptiste Moreau
strategyDescription: Cooperates unless betrayed twice, then betrays once before resuming cooperation.

name: Hiroshi Takada
strategyDescription: Cooperates 95% of the time, but will betray once if continuously betrayed.

name: Diego Esteban Vargas
strategyDescription: Starts neutral, mimics opponent if they betray too often.

name: Amara Okafor
strategyDescription: Cooperates unless an economic advantage is possible through betrayal.

name: Alfredo Bellucci
strategyDescription: Always betrays first, then tests if opponent will cooperate again.
